rows: Unique column identifier. If you omit a value, Mobile Creatio uses thecodeproperty value as an identifier.
Column caption. If you omit a value, Mobile Creatio receives thecaptionproperty value from data source.
Column width. If you omit a value, Mobile Creatio uses out-of-the-box column width (120px).
The flag that determines whether to hide a column. By default,false.Available valuestrueA column is hidden.falseA column is shown.
The flag that determines whether to freeze a column. By default,false.Available valuestrueA column is frozen.falseA column is not frozen.
The flag that sets the column to read-only. By default,false.Available valuestrueThe column is editable.falseThe column is not editable.
Parameters that determine conditions to view and edit column. List of parameters depends on column type.
html:
id

Unique column identifier. If you omit a value, Mobile Creatio uses the code property value as an identifier.

code

Column name.

caption

Column caption. If you omit a value, Mobile Creatio receives the caption property value from data source.

dataValueType

Column data type.

width

Column width. If you omit a value, Mobile Creatio uses out-of-the-box column width (120px).

hidden

The flag that determines whether to hide a column. By default, false.

Available values

true

A column is hidden.

false

A column is shown.

sticky

The flag that determines whether to freeze a column. By default, false.

Available values

true

A column is frozen.

false

A column is not frozen.

readOnly

The flag that sets the column to read-only. By default, false.

Available values

true

The column is editable.

false

The column is not editable.

cellView

Parameters that determine conditions to view and edit column. List of parameters depends on column type.
